Label.en: Here is the famous 'Fountain of the Innocents'
Label.fr: Voici la fameuse 'Fountaine des Innocents'
Label.es: Here is the famous 'Fountain of the Innocents'
Label.zh: Here is the famous 'Fountain of the Innocents'

Label.en: Now, I'm sure you're wondering how it gets that name?
Label.fr: Je suis sûr que tu te demandes d'où vient le nom
Label.es: Now, I'm sure you're wondering how it gets that name?
Label.zh: Now, I'm sure you're wondering how it gets that name?

Label.en: Well, I will tell you anyway... just in case...
Label.fr: Je te le dis tout de même...au cas où....
Label.es: Well, I will tell you anyway... just in case...
Label.zh: Well, I will tell you anyway... just in case...

Label.en: It's named after the cemetery that previously occupied the space, called the 'Cemetery of the Innocents'
Label.fr: Elle tient son nom du cimetière qui se trouvait là, appelé le 'Cimetière des Innocents'
Label.es: It's named after the cemetery that previously occupied the space, called the 'Cemetery of the Innocents'
Label.zh: It's named after the cemetery that previously occupied the space, called the 'Cemetery of the Innocents'

Label.en: I guess you're wondering how that one got it's name?
Label.fr: Et maintenant tu te demandes d'où lui tient son nom ?
Label.es: I guess you're wondering how that one got it's name?
Label.zh: I guess you're wondering how that one got it's name?

Label.en: Please let me tell you anyway... I have to sound smart!
Label.fr: Laisse-moi te le dire...Il faut que j'ai l'air utile et érudit !
Label.es: Please let me tell you anyway... I have to sound smart!
Label.zh: Please let me tell you anyway... I have to sound smart!

Label.en: It was named after a church that was there previously... called... the Church of the Innocents!
Label.fr: Il tient son nom de l'église qui s'y trouvait précédemment...appelée... l'église des Innocents!
Label.es: It was named after a church that was there previously... called... the Church of the Innocents!
Label.zh: It was named after a church that was there previously... called... the Church of the Innocents!

Label.en: Now, I'm sure you're dying to know how THAT got it's name?
Label.fr: A ce stade, je suis sûr que tu meurs d'envie de savoir d'où ELLE tient son nom :)
Label.es: Now, I'm sure you're dying to know how THAT got it's name?
Label.zh: Now, I'm sure you're dying to know how THAT got it's name?

Label.en: It was named after the famous 'Massacre of the Innocents' from the bible, organised by King Herod
Label.fr: Elle tient son nom du fameux 'Massacre des Innocents' cité dans la bible, organisé par le roi Herod
Label.es: It was named after the famous 'Massacre of the Innocents' from the bible, organised by King Herod
